markdown: ###### Moderate Positive reputation with [Huana](/huana/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - Diccila | conc = | next = Bounty - Rafiq the Red Beard | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Huana_02 | guid = ba9b0712-f606-4577-ac98-0fdcdc37d266 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Barati has tasked the Watcher with hunting down [Oheiro](/oheiro/), a captain of the [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) who commands the junk ship [The Stone Anchor](/theStoneAnchor/). There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. ## Walkthrough * Oheiro can be found sailing Stone Anchor along the southern end of the [Kua o Rikuhu](/kuaORikuhuIslands/) island chain due east of [Neketaka](/neketaka/). He's a relatively low challenge due to the comparatively modest armament his Junk carries. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Huana_02.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Oheiro''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Barati has tasked me with hunting down Oheiro, a captain of the Royal Deadfire Company who commands the junk ship Stone Anchor. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Oheiro and take his ship's triumph.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Oheiro can be found sailing Stone Anchor along the southern end of the Kua o Rikuhu island chain due east of Neketaka. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Barati.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Oheiro's bounty is ready to be claimed. Barati can be found on the upper floor of the palace in Serpent's Crown in Neketaka. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I dealt with Oheiro and claimed the reward for his bounty. |}
